about_me: I am a dedicated physiotherapist with expertise in orthopedic rehabilitation. I specialize in treating sports injuries and spinal conditions. With over 10 years of experience, I strive to provide personalized care to my patients and help them regain their mobility and improve their quality of life.

As a physiotherapy specialist, my focus is on neurological rehabilitation, specifically helping patients recover from strokes and spinal cord injuries. With 8 years of experience, I have witnessed the transformative power of physiotherapy in improving the lives of individuals with neurological conditions. I am committed to providing compassionate care and achieving the best outcomes for my patients.

With a doctorate in pediatric physiotherapy and 12 years of experience, I specialize in providing rehabilitation services to children with conditions such as cerebral palsy and developmental delays. I am passionate about working with children and their families, creating a nurturing environment that supports their growth and development. My goal is to help children achieve their full potential through targeted physiotherapy interventions.
